Hi Nidhi,

Just a quick update, we’ve gone ahead and fixed the issue with the templates. It turns out there was a missing condition that was keeping some of them from showing properly.

Here’s what we did:

  • Added the missing conditional logic on the template
  • Double-checked all products to make sure everything looks right
  • Cleared both the site and server cache, just to be safe

When you get a chance, could you give it another try on your end? If anything still seems off, opening the site in incognito mode can sometimes help clear up any lingering cache issues.

Hope this clears things up! Let us know if you need anything else.

Hi Glen,

As you mentioned, the updates were limited to the list you sent through. However, everything on the site seems to have reverted back to the previous design format,

We just need them back to this format as seen here: https://duracube.com.au/product/bench-seating-shoe-box-island-sbi/

Kind Regards,

Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant





13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



DuraCube



DuraCube

Thanks for following up!

Just to clarify—these updates were based on the details in your previous message, so I’ve applied the changes accordingly. Here’s what’s been updated so far:

  • Heading layout adjustments on the following pages:

    • Wall with Coat Rail
    • Wall with Shelving
    • Island
    • Inset VB520
    • Semi-Recessed VB350

  • Link removed from the Compact Laminate Cut to Size Service page

If you could send over a list of all the product pages that need updating, I’ll make sure everything’s aligned with your current design. https://duracube.com.au/product/bench-seating-shoe-box-island-sbi/

Hi Glen,

I'm going to need you to take another look at the product pages. Unfortunately, I'm not seeing the changes you've made, and it appears the formatting has reverted to the style from our old website.

While I can see the breadcrumb issue has been addressed, the format used isn't aligned with our current design .

Could you please review and resolve this as soon as possible?

Kind Regards,

Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant





13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



DuraCube



DuraCube

Hi Nidhi,

All done on my end!

  • The spacing adjustments have been applied to the listed product pages, following the same visual style as the reference page.
  • The Leisure category link has also been removed from the Compact Laminate page, so it now stands alone as requested.

Feel free to take a look and let me know if you’d like any further tweaks. Always happy to help!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Glen Tenorio
Allie Borcena assigned to Cindy Valderama
Workflow **T1 tickets assigned to Rika** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

Could you please assist with the following requests:

1. Spacing Adjustments for Product Pages
Using this page as a reference:
https://duracube.com.au/product/bench-seating-shoe-box-island-sbi/
We'd like to improve the visual spacing on the following product pages. This could be done by adjusting the heading layout or breaking up the paragraph immediately below the heading to ensure a more even and balanced appearance:

  • https://duracube.com.au/product/wall-with-coat-rail-bsw-c/

  • https://duracube.com.au/product/wall-with-shelving-bsw-s/

  • https://duracube.com.au/product/island-bsi/

  • https://duracube.com.au/product/inset-vb520/

  • https://duracube.com.au/product/semi-recessed-vb350/

2. Category Link Removal for Compact Laminate Page
Currently, the Compact Laminate page under the Products section is linked to the Leisure category. We would like to remove this link so that the page functions as a standalone product page instead. Please let us know if this is possible.

Thank you in advance
Kind Regards,
Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant
13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
1300 387 228
DuraCube
DuraCube
